title: Ground Convoy Route Deconfliction
description: A planner must deconflict the routes of two separate convoys (one supply, one combat) and a scheduled artillery fire mission.

tasks.description: Input the planned routes for both convoys and the target area and timing for the artillery mission.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner accurately enters all mission data.

tasks.description: Run a deconfliction analysis to identify any points where the convoys might interfere or be in the artillery's surface danger zone (SDZ).
tasks.expected_outcome: The tool correctly identifies that one convoy's route passes through the artillery SDZ at the scheduled time.

tasks.description: Adjust the timing of the supply convoy's departure to ensure it clears the SDZ before the fire mission begins.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner resolves the conflict by adjusting the timeline.
